The deceased, identified as Satish Netam, Shyamlal Netam, and Sunil Shori, were residents of nearby villages, prompting ongoing investigations.

description: Hayat, a 22-year-old TikTok content creator, was arrested in June in the eastern city of Faisalabad. Yousuf's death drew widespread condemnation

title: Adoptions at decadal high in India, Maha tops list accounting for 20% of tota
When motivation dithers, discipline handholds
description: As an emotion-proof, sustainable, and trusted tool, discipline is an all-weather friend

title: Meteor shower or sat debris? Fiery streak dazzles Delhi-NCR skyline
description: A mysterious streak of light dazzled residents across Delhi, Noida, and Gurgaon, sparking speculation about its origin. Eyewitnesses reported a fiery trail fragmenting in the night sky around 1:20 AM on Saturday. While some suspected a meteor shower or satellite debris, a Grok comment suggested it could be space debris from a Chinese rocket re-entering the atmosphere.

title: Social media influencer Shahajahan Shareef arrested for defaming Bengaluru in video
description: A social media influencer, S Shahajahan Shareef, has been arrested in Bengaluru for allegedly spreading fake news and defaming the city. She posted an old video from Uttar Pradesh, falsely claiming it depicted rowdyism in Bengaluru, causing public concern. Police investigations revealed the video's origin, leading to her arrest and the seizure of her devices.

title: NBA Trade Rumors: Lakers eye $30M Miami Heat star; Rui Hachimura emerges as key asset
description: The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly targeting Andrew Wiggins in a trade centered around Rui Hachimura. The Lakers aim to bolster their defense and spacing alongside LeBron James and Luka Dončić. Miami could benefit from Hachimura's youth, cap flexibility, and potential draft assets, positioning them for a future rebuild or retool.

title: White House says $1,00,000 H-1B visa fee to be one-time payment
description: This is NOT an annual fee. It's a one-time fee that applies... only to new visas, not renewals, and not current visa holders, says White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt

Modi’s visit to Manipur | A Prime Minister’s pit stop for promises
description: In Narendra Modi’s first visit to Manipur after ethnic violence broke out between the minority Kuki-Zo and majority Meitei communities in 2023, up to ₹8,500 crore was announced in investments for the State. The Hindu finds that the PM met with select displaced people, while those he didn’t meet were divided: some said it gave them hope for an end to the conflict; some that investments didn’t necessarily mean peace

description: Back then, the streets were alive but wide, and bustling but unhurried

title: Bihar polls announcement likely in first week of October
description: Bihar is bracing for state elections, likely in two phases starting early October, pitting CM Nitish Kumar's NDA against a determined opposition. Caste dynamics, intensified by the state's recent caste count revealing a significant OBC/EBC population, are expected to heavily influence the polls.

title: Is it feasible to blend isobutanol and diesel? | Explained
description: When will the pilot project be completed? Why has ethanol been discarded as the possible alternative? What is the raw material? How is it produced? What are the pros and cons of using this biofuel? Will it have a bearing on ignition and better engine performance?

title: 'How do you pack your life in less than 28 hours': Bengaluru H1-B workers in frenzy
description: A sudden Trump administration order triggered chaos in India, demanding H-1B visa holders return to the US within 28 hours. Many individuals attending family events or on personal trips faced immense pressure to book flights, fearing deportation or hefty fines. The abrupt announcement caused widespread panic and financial strain as people scrambled to comply with the unexpected deadline.

title: Former Delhi captain Mithun Manhas set to be next BCCI President
description: The BCCI election is scheduled during its annual general meeting (AGM) at its headquarters here on September 28. On Saturday, the first of the two-day window for filing nomination papers, top Indian cricket officials met in New Delhi

title: $100k for H-1B visa: 3-point clarification issued; fee doesn't apply to existing holders
description: The White House clarified that the newly announced $100,000 H-1B visa fee applies only to new applications, not renewals or existing visa holders. This clarification addresses widespread confusion following a presidential proclamation that initially sparked fears of urgent deadlines and potential disruption to the tech talent pipeline.

title: Why is India on the U.S. blacklist on fentanyl? | Explained
description: What are fentanyl precursors? Why is it difficult to monitor the trade? How does the supply chain work?

description: The assault came as 10 countries, including Australia, Belgium, Britain and Canada, are scheduled to formally recognise an independent Palestinian state on Monday, ahead of the annual leaders' gathering at the U.N. General Assembly next week.

title: Former Delhi captain Mithun Manhas tipped to become new BCCI president
description: Mithun Manhas, the former Delhi captain, is the leading candidate for BCCI president after discussions in New Delhi. The nomination deadline is Sunday, with elections on September 28. Raghuram Bhat of KSCA is expected to secure a position in the apex council, while Arun Dhumal is likely to remain as IPL chairman. Final decisions are anticipated after further discussions.

description: California police are investigating a possible link between an online post alleging racial discrimination and the fatal shooting of Mohammed Nizamuddin, a software engineer from Telangana. Nizamuddin, who was terminated from his job in February, reportedly attacked his roommate with a knife, leading to the police intervention.

Sam Altman's bold claim: 'People will lose jobs'; AI replaces support
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman predicts AI will soon replace customer service jobs, followed by programmers. While acknowledging potential job losses, he believes roles requiring human connection, like nursing, will remain. Industry experts express skepticism, with Gartner forecasting a reversal of support headcount reductions by 2027.

title: H-1B visa fee hike: A self-goal for US? How India stands to gain
description: Donald Trump's decision to impose a $100,000 fee on H-1B visas has sparked debate, with Indian leaders warning of potential benefits for India. Experts suggest this move could discourage applications, accelerate offshoring, and prompt skilled professionals to return to India. While facing backlash in the US, the long-term impact may fuel India's growth as a global innovation hub.

title: Oral microbes tied to higher pancreatic cancer risk: key factors and prevention tips
description: A recent NYU Langone Health study reveals a significant connection between oral microbes and pancreatic cancer risk. Specific bacteria and fungi in the mouth can more than triple the likelihood of developing this aggressive cancer. Maintaining good oral hygiene is highlighted as a potential preventive measure, alongside other lifestyle changes like avoiding smoking and maintaining a healthy diet.

title: H-1B visa hike: JPMorgan asks staff to return to US before Sept 21
description: JPMorgan and Microsoft are urging H-1B visa holders to return to the U.S. immediately due to President Trump's new directive imposing a $100,000 annual fee on companies for each H-1B worker. This move, effective September 21st, is anticipated to disproportionately impact Indian IT firms like Infosys and TCS, who heavily rely on H-1B visas to deploy professionals in the U.S.

title: NFL: Gracie Hunt shares heartfelt update with boyfriend amid Chiefs skid
description: Gracie Hunt, the Kansas City Chiefs' heiress, shared heartwarming photos on Instagram from a wedding she attended with her boyfriend, Derek Green. The couple, who have known each other since childhood through their families' connection to the Chiefs, looked deeply in love. Hunt expressed her views on love and faith in the post's caption, emphasizing its importance in daily life.

title: Charlie Kirk’s assassination: Erika Kirk pulls Taylor Swift into controversy
description: Following Charlie Kirk's shocking assassination, his widow, Erika Kirk, has ignited controversy by involving Taylor Swift in memorial plans. Erika's ambition to outshine a Taylor Swift concert at Kirk's memorial event on September 21st has sparked outrage among Swift's fans.

title: Lauren Kyle: NHL star Connor McDavid’s wife opens her cottage retreat
description: Lauren Kyle McDavid, wife of Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid, is featured in ELLE Canada, showcasing her lakeside cottage. The interior designer, entrepreneur, and founder of Kyle & Co Design highlights a space that blends European elegance with modern simplicity, as her retreat reflects her love for entertaining. Along with thoughtful design details, she creates a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
